abstract: Sure, it’s in its eighteenth season, but “Law & Order” on NBC remains a ratings force to be reckoned with: its two-hour debut on Wednesday drew the largest audience for the night, 13.4 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates. NBC won the night overall in total viewers, leading the 8 p.m. hour with its game show “Deal or No Deal” (12.2 million).
lead_paragraph: Sure, it’s in its eighteenth season, but “Law & Order” on NBC remains a ratings force to be reckoned with: its two-hour debut on Wednesday drew the largest audience for the night, 13.4 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates. NBC won the night overall in total viewers, leading the 8 p.m. hour with its game show “Deal or No Deal” (12.2 million).

headline.main: ‘Law and Order’ Still Delivers for NBC
